description: Full description of parent app: Demolition of existing buildings at 34-40 White Church Lane and 29-31 Commercial Road and erection of building to provide a flexible use commercial space (Use Class E) at ground floor and residential units (Use Class C3) above with new public realm, cycle parking and all associated works.Minor Material Amendments to Planning permission Ref: PA/15/02527, Dated 16/12/2016: Amendments include:1)	Provision of 2 additional storeys, from 18 storeys to 20 storeys. (The building height increase limited to approximately 2.4m).2)	Amendments to the affordable housing and tenure split, and the dwelling mix.3)	Amendments to the proposed layouts and reduction in floor to ceiling height in selective areas .4)	Amendments to the lift shafts and introduction of a smoke extract shaft.
site_name: 34-40 White Church Lane And 29-31 Commercial Road, London, E1
